price: Оё надидӣ, ки онон дар ҳар лағву беҳудае [ҳайрону] саргаштаанд?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
